sentences.en: an expensive subsidy which distorts the market
sentences.cn: 扰乱市场秩序的高价补贴

sentences.en: Animal rights groups have attempted to distort the facts about animal research.
sentences.cn: 动物权益组织试图歪曲动物研究的真相.

sentences.en: Any attempt to distort or even deny resolution 2758 ( XXVI ) is futile.
sentences.cn: 任何旨在歪曲、至否定联大第2758 ( XVI ) 决议的企图都完全是徒劳的.

sentences.en: Does God pervert judgment, and does the Almighty distort justice?
sentences.cn: 天主岂能违背公道?全能者岂能屈枉正义?

sentences.en: Exaggerated sections distort the shapes of folds as well as bed thickness.
sentences.cn: 比例放大的剖面歪曲褶皱的形态和岩层厚度.

sentences.en: Freshly cast grids are very flexible and may bend and distort if pasted immediately.
sentences.cn: 新铸出的板栅很柔软,如果立即涂膏,可能造成弯曲和歪斜.

sentences.en: Go to Filter > Distort > Polar Coordinates and select Rectangular to Polar.
sentences.cn: 到过滤器>扭曲>极坐标,并选取矩形极性.

sentences.en: His account was badly distorted by the press.
sentences.cn: 他的话被报界严重歪曲。

sentences.en: Its surface is smoothness, does not distort, no spot.
sentences.cn: 玻璃表面平滑 、 不变形 、 无钢化斑.

sentences.en: Keeps the aspect ratio of your images so they do not distort.
sentences.cn: 保持长宽比您的图片,使他们不扭曲.

sentences.en: Some newspapers distort news to make It'seem more exciting.
sentences.cn: 一些报纸为了使新闻看起来更令人兴奋而歪曲事实.

sentences.en: Such manipulation can sometimes distort complex waveforms, obscuring identification of events.
sentences.cn: 这种作法有时会使复杂的波形畸变, 模糊了同相轴的识辨标志.

sentences.en: Tall buildings can distort radio signals.
sentences.cn: 高大的建筑物会使无线电信号失真。

sentences.en: The current creates magnetic field that weaken and distort the signal.
sentences.cn: 电流会产生磁场,从而使信号减弱和失真.

sentences.en: The etched metal - film grids are very fragile and easy to distort, wrinkle or tear.
sentences.cn: 蚀刻出来的金属箔格栅是很脆弱的,容易变形 、 皱折或撕裂.

sentences.en: The thin glass slides distort under presure and the fringes move and change accordingly.
sentences.cn: 受压后薄玻璃片会变形,因此条纹也会跟着移动和改变.

sentences.en: This caused the sound to distort.
When you use your abilities out of responsibility you distort them.
sentences.cn: 当你出自责任心去运用你的能力时你就扭曲了他们.

words.tran_cn: 变形；[物] 失真；扭曲；曲解
扭曲（distortasd的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to report something in a way that is not completely true or correct
to change the appearance, sound, or shape of something so that it is strange or unclear

trans.tran_cn: 扭曲， 弄歪， 歪曲
trans.tran_en: to report something in a way that is not completely true or correct
